title: Baked rice in bolognese sauce
ingredients: ['For the bolognese sauce', '3 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1 shallot, finely chopped', '1/2 carrot, finely chopped', '500g beef mince', '120ml white wine', '2 (400g) tins Italian tomatoes, crushed or passata', 'salt, to taste', 'For the bake', '500g Arborio rice', '1 egg, lightly beaten', '200g grated Pecorino cheese', '200g fresh mozzarella, chopped']
